title: Police left children at mercy of grooming gangs, review says
description: A report criticises a series of failed investigations by Greater Manchester Police in Rochdale.

title: Home Office to ban Hizb ut-Tahrir as terror group
description: The controversial Islamist group is accused of praising the Hamas attacks on Israel.

title: Iceland volcano: Aerial footage shows lava burning houses
description: Two volcanic fissures opened in the ground near Grindavik, sending lava spilling into the town.

title: UK weather: Cold blast brings snow to many parts of UK
description: Travel disruption is also expected as yellow weather warnings have been issued across the UK.

title: Israel: Woman killed, 17 hurt in suspected Palestinian car-ramming attack
description: Two Palestinians are arrested after several cars are used in what police say was a terrorist attack.

title: New train strike dates announced by Aslef drivers' union
description: Fresh walkouts are planned for January and February as the dispute enters its third calendar year.

title: Boeing to increase quality inspections of 737 Max production
description: The plane maker will allow independent assessments after a door plug fell from an Alaska Airlines flight.

title: Caroline Glachan murder: Two men jailed for killing schoolgirl in 1996
description: The body of Caroline Glachan was discovered on a river bank in West Dunbartonshire more than 27 years ago.

title: Five Republican storylines to watch for at Iowa caucuses
description: A possible knockout punch, a fight for second place and one candidate's last stand - Anthony Zurcher has the lowdown.

title: Denmark's cool, Scandi 'coronation' felt similar to the UK's
description: Daniela Relph expected Scandinavian coolness at King Frederik X's proclamation, but was surprised by familiarity.
